definition: "house on a cliff" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 53), occurring in 店, 序, 底 etc
as different as can be (idiom)/poles apart
Dongting Lake in northeast Hunan province
criminal court/abbr. for 刑事法庭[xing2 shi4 fa3 ting2]

sentences.english: Forensic dean blames administrative front courtyard to ought not to not see object tousle subpoena.
sentences.chinese: 法院院长责备行政庭不该不看对象乱发传票。

sentences.english: The Supreme Court did not hand down a sentence, but ordered the Appeals Court to re-examine the case.
sentences.chinese: 但最高法院没有宣布判决，而是责令上诉庭复议此案。

sentences.english: The appeals court has agreed to hear that case next week.
sentences.chinese: 上诉庭同意下周开庭审理那件案子。

sentences.english: If the verdicts and sentences are upheld, the executions must be carried out within 30 days.
sentences.chinese: 如果上诉庭维持原判，死刑必须在30天之内执行。

sentences.english: Moreover, a courtroom opposite to Wu's hearing room will temporarily serve as a medical room.
sentences.chinese: 此外，问讯庭对面的一个法庭也将改为暂时医疗间。

sentences.english: A youth was tried in the criminal court for stealing.
sentences.chinese: 偷窃罪而在刑事庭受审。

sentences.english: What factors does the Pre-Trial Chamber consider in making its decision on the arrest warrant?
sentences.chinese: 在做拘捕证决定时，预审庭考虑什么因素？

sentences.english: The out-of-towner had to attend by proxy as he was still recovering in the hospital.
sentences.chinese: 镇外男孩仍然躺在医院里，是他的代理人代他出的庭。

sentences.english: Thank you for calling Oakwood Residence Beijing Service Apartments.
sentences.chinese: 欢迎致电绿城奥克伍德华庭服务式公寓。

sentences.english: Two proposals of planting trees by the roadside and courtyard planning are given in the paper.
sentences.chinese: 提出了对道旁植树和店椿园中庭规划建设的两点建议。

sentences.english: Teleporting via a movement chamber or hive cause the player to uncloak .
sentences.chinese: 传送经运动庭或蜂房造成玩家来揭露。

sentences.english: An appeals court ordered a partial retrial for Mr. Riina.
sentences.chinese: 一个上诉庭要求对里伊纳一案进行复审。

sentences.english: It's another open and shut, though - Bagman.
sentences.chinese: 还另外要开一次庭，尽管，中间人。

sentences.english: The Crown Court deals with criminal trails on indictment.
sentences.chinese: 皇家刑事庭根据起诉进行刑事审判。

sentences.english: Furthermore, these child-raising families may raise other people's children in addition to their own.
sentences.chinese: 庭除了自己的孩子外也可以抚养其他人家的孩子。

sentences.english: Any further proceedings will take place in the Appellate Term of the Supreme Court.
sentences.chinese: 任何进一步的程序都将于高等法院的上诉庭处理。

definition: to behave informally as equals/not to stand on ceremony
worthy or virtuous person/honorific used for a person of the same or a younger generation
to arrive/to reach (esp. perfection)/utmost/(used in commercials)
to wait/to inquire after/to watch/season/climate/(old) period of five days
high mountain/highest peak of a mountain ridge
abbr. for 梵教[Fan4 jiao4] Brahmanism/abbr. for Sanskrit 梵語|梵语[Fan4 yu3] or 梵文[Fan4 wen2]/abbr. for 梵蒂岡|梵蒂冈[Fan4 di4 gang1], the Vatican
to discuss together/to try to reach a common judgment/panel discussion
